qna.question: How do I book a guide on your website?
qna.answer: To book a guide, visit the 'Book a Guide' section, choose between a certified or local guide, browse available profiles, and complete the booking through our secure payment gateway.

qna.question: Can I choose my guide based on language preference?
qna.answer: Yes, you can filter guides by language preference when selecting a guide. This ensures you find a guide who speaks your preferred language.

qna.question: How far in advance should I book a guide?
qna.answer: It's recommended to book your guide at least a week in advance, especially during peak tourist seasons, to ensure availability.

qna.question: Can I modify or cancel my booking after confirmation?
qna.answer: Yes, you can modify or cancel your booking up to 48 hours before the scheduled tour. Please refer to our cancellation policy for details.

qna.question: What is a certified guide?
qna.answer: A certified guide is a professional who has been officially licensed by the government after completing required training and examinations. They are authorized to provide official tour services.

qna.question: What are the benefits of hiring a certified guide?
qna.answer: Certified guides have extensive knowledge of the region's history, culture, and landmarks. They provide a professional and reliable service, ensuring a comprehensive and enjoyable tour experience.

qna.question: Who should consider hiring a local guide?
qna.answer: Local guides are ideal for domestic tourists looking for a more informal and personalized tour experience. They are also a great option for exploring lesser-known local spots.

qna.question: Can international tourists hire local guides?
qna.answer: While international tourists can hire local guides, it's important to note that local guides may not have the same level of training or certification as government-certified guides. Certified guides are recommended for official tours.

qna.question: Are guides available in all tourist locations?
qna.answer: We strive to provide guides in all major tourist destinations. Certified guides are more commonly available in popular locations, while local guides may be found in more remote areas.

qna.question: How can I check the availability of guides in my destination?
qna.answer: You can check the availability of guides by selecting your destination on the 'Book a Guide' page. Available guides will be displayed based on your selected location and dates.

qna.question: What should I do if no guides are available in my chosen location?
qna.answer: If no guides are available in your selected location, you can contact our support team for assistance. We may be able to arrange a guide from a nearby area.

qna.question: Do local guides operate year-round?
qna.answer: Local guides generally operate year-round, but their availability may vary depending on the season and local demand. It's best to check availability in advance.
